caption.center: Troy PARKER v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Noxubee County; Joe O. Sams, Sr., J.
opinion.attorneys:
Carter Davidson, Dudley H. Carter, Columbus, for appellant.
A.F. Summer, Atty. Gen., by Ben H. Walley and Karen A. Gilfoy, Asst. Attys. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before INZER, P.J., and SUGG and LEE, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
GILLESPIE, C.J., PATTERSON, P.J., and SMITH, ROBERTSON, WALKER and BROOM, JJ., concur.
